name: Blue Marble Sniper: Bullet Hell Stealth
name_original: Blue Marble Sniper: Bullet Hell Stealth
description:
This is my Ludum Dare #41 entry, a Bullet Hell-Stealth game!

More information at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$83097

Update: I uploaded a new HTML5 build for convenience. The previous build had issues playing because you weren't able to right-click in the browser without bringing up a context menu. I also took the opportunity to fix a few other bugs, and add a leaderboard at the end. If you are looking for the Ludum Dare version without these bugfixes and leaderboard, you can download the Windows version below (which is unmodified)
